description: This file is a server entry point for a Remix.js application, handling server-side rendering, including request handling, bot detection, and streaming HTML responses.

methods.name: handleRequest
methods.description: Main request handler for the server that distinguishes between bot and browser requests and manages CORS headers.

methods.name: handleBotRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side rendering for bot requests using streaming, manages the HTML stream response.

methods.name: handleBrowserRequest
methods.description: Handles server-side streaming response for browser requests.
